howToContribute.text: You can help contribute by helping improve this site or by helping us translate this site to more languages. Any help is much appreciated.

handbook.title: Handbook
handbook.description: Find detailed information on any condition
handbook.placeholder: Name or symptoms of the condition
handbook.shortAdvice: For informational purposes only. Consult your local medical authority for advice.
handbook.longAdvice: Medical information on HealthDeck doesn't apply to everyone and isn't medical advice. If you have a medical concern, make sure to contact a healthcare provider. If you think you may have a medical emergency, immediately call your doctor or your local emergency number.
handbook.search: Search for conditions by name or symptoms
